// src/FunFacts.js
import React from'react';import CountUp from'react-countup';import'../Styles/FunFacts.css';import'@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FunFacts=()=>{const facts=[{id:1,icon:'handshake',number:4597,label:'People Rised'},{id:2,icon:'users',number:8945,label:'Volunteer'},{id:3,icon:'dove',number:10,label:'Poor People Saved',suffix:'M'},{id:4,icon:'globe',number:100,label:'Country Member'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"fun-facts-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Our Fun Facts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["We Believe That We Can Save ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"More Lifes With You"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"facts",children:facts.map(fact=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"fact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fact-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-".concat(fact.icon)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fact-number",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CountUp,{start:0,end:fact.number,duration:10,suffix:fact.suffix||'+'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fact-label",children:fact.label})]},fact.id))})]});};export default FunFacts;
